pages.text: Raw Radiant Quartz is an unrefined magical crystal that makes up the basis of all of Arcane Archives. It is primarily a crafting component.$(br2)When you activate certain blocks with a piece of Raw Radiant Quartz while sneaking, it is converted in place into another block.

Chests convert into $(l:tier1/radiant_chest)$(9)Radiant Chests$(). If used on a double chest, only the side you activate will convertâ€”all items from both sides will be pulled in.$(br2)Crafting Tables convert into $(l:tier1/radiant_crafting_table)$(9)Radiant Crafting Tables$().$(br2)Furnaces convert into $(l:tier1/radiant_crafting_table)$(9)Radiant Furnaces$().

When Raw Radiant Quartz is generated over top of a Radiant Resonator, it forms a large $(9)cluster$(). This cluster is a light source.$(br2)The cluster itself can be collected with a Silk Touch tool. Otherwise, breaking it drops a piece of Raw Radiant Quartz.

pages.title: Astral Sorcery
pages.text: Raw Radiant Quartz can be used in a $(9)Lightwell$() to generate Liquid Starlight.$(br2)Its generation rate is very slow, but it operates for a significantly longer time than Aquamarine before shattering.

pages.title: Thaumcraft
pages.text: Raw Radiant Quartz Clusters can be used as an infusion stabilizer.
